```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

Look at the raw data

```{r}
view(diamonds)
```

Explore the data

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
[ggpairs(diamonds)
```

Create your own data plots

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
         geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
         geom_histogram(binwidth = .5)
```
